question: 催促する
sourceAnswer: To Urge, To Press For, To Demand
activeAnswer: To Urge, To Press For, To Demand
sourceMnemonic: If <ja>催促</ja> is <kanji>urge</kanji>, then the verb version would be <vocabulary>to urge</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Will help to know <ja>催促</ja> first.
